title: Construction of Elevated Expressway connecting Outer Circular Highway at Athurugiriyta to Kelaniya New Bridge via Rajagiriya
decision_details: - The Road Development Authority has conducted a feasibility study to construct an Elevated Expressway  from the new Kelani Bridge to the Athurugiriya Interchange on the Outer Circular Highway via Rajagiriya along the Port Access Elevated Expressway which is being constructed under the funds of Asian Development Bank. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of  Highways to take necessary action to call for Request for Proposals (RFP) to  implement the above project with 100% foreign financing on Build, Operate, Transfer (BOT) basis, was approved by the Cabinet.
